column3: Just what you want. Friendly well-trained masseuses. Easy music sets the tone. No frills (no spa etc) Just the massage at a reasonable price.

This location is the worst! The owner Jill Karrenbrock not only has a bad reputation but runs a sloppy business. The new facials are horrible, my massage therapist was late. If you are a resident or visiting Palos Verdes don't bother going here.
